statements: DELETE FROM inventory_tracking WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM inventory_tracking WHERE equipment_name = 'Printer' AND location = 'Room B';
DELETE FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE vendor = 'ABC Supplies' AND quantity = 0;
DELETE FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE supplier = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND maintenance_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM NetworkingEquipment WHERE equipment_id = 5 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND equipment_id IN (SELECT equipment_id FROM NetworkingEquipment WHERE location_id = 3);
